name: Standard Room
description: A comfortable room with essential amenities, suitable for single travelers or couples.

name: Deluxe Room
description: A more spacious room with upgraded furnishings and additional amenities for enhanced comfort.

name: Suite
description: A luxurious and expansive accommodation, typically featuring a separate living area and premium amenities.

name: Family Room
description: Designed for families, offering ample space and often includes multiple beds or interconnected rooms.

name: Apartment
description: A self-contained unit with a separate living area, bedroom(s), and often a kitchenette, ideal for extended stays.

name: Executive Room
description: Tailored for business travelers, offering a dedicated workspace and access to executive lounge benefits.

name: Penthouse
description: The most luxurious and largest accommodation, usually located on the top floor with panoramic views and exclusive services.

name: Studio
description: A single room combining sleeping, living, and often kitchen facilities, perfect for individuals or short stays.
